description: The collapse of an eight-story building in Bangladesh that housed several garment factories injured hundreds of people.
title: Building Collapse Near Dhaka, Bangladesh
title_page: Building Collapse Near Dhaka, Bangladesh - The New York Times
maintext:
Slide 1 of 13,
An eight-story building in Bangladesh that housed several garment factories collapsed on Wednesday, killing at least 124 people, injuring more than 1,000 and leaving many of the 2,500 garment factory workers trapped in the rubble.
